text: Wisalla (Aymara wisa the first-born of twins, -lla a suffix, 'little first- born twin', Hispanicized spelling Huisalla) is a mountain in the Andes of Bolivia. It is situated in the Oruro Department, Sajama Province, Curahuara de Carangas Municipality. Wisalla lies south-west of the dormant Sajama volcano. == References == Category:Mountains of Oruro Department
title: Wisalla
